0000001000000111 0100100100001101 0 -> sum: 0100101100010100, cout: 0
1000111010100100 0111011100100010 1 -> sum: 0000010111000111, cout: 1
1100001000001001 0101100011000111 1 -> sum: 0001101011010001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
